statements: DELETE FROM CropRotationData WHERE year = 2020 AND crop_type = 'Corn';
DELETE FROM CropRotationData WHERE crop_type = 'Soybean' AND yield_data < 50.0;
DELETE FROM CropRotationData WHERE crop_type = 'Corn' AND year < 2020;
DELETE FROM CropRotationData WHERE year = 2021 AND crop_type = 'Wheat' AND yield_data > 50.75;
DELETE FROM YearlyYieldData WHERE crop_type = 'Corn' AND year = 2021;
DELETE FROM CropRotationPractices WHERE practice_id = 1;
DELETE FROM YearlyYieldData WHERE year = 2020 AND crop_type = 'Corn';
DELETE FROM CropRotationPractices WHERE rotation_years < 3 OR crop_type = 'Wheat';
DELETE FROM crop_yield_data WHERE year = 2021 AND crop_type = 'Corn';
DELETE FROM crop_rotation_history WHERE current_crop = 'Soybean';
DELETE FROM crop_yield_data WHERE year = 2019 AND crop_type = 'Corn';
DELETE FROM crop_rotation_history WHERE year = 2020 AND rotation_order = 2 AND previous_crop = 'Wheat';
DELETE FROM farmers WHERE farmer_id = 1;
DELETE FROM yields WHERE farmer_id = 2 AND yield_year = 2020;
DELETE FROM crop_rotation WHERE rotation_id = 1;
DELETE FROM yields WHERE farmer_id = 5 AND crop_id = 3 AND yield_year = 2022;
DELETE FROM crop_data WHERE crop_name = 'Corn'
DELETE FROM farm_operations WHERE operation_type = 'Harvest'
DELETE FROM crop_data WHERE data_id = 1;
DELETE FROM years_yield WHERE year = 2021 AND yield < 50;
